before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"6nks","text":"Check the planned procedure is covered by existing Research Ethics Committee approval and other required approvals.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d7n85","text":"Check that you have the correct personal protective equipment, supplies and consumables.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"eue30","text":"This protocol details the steps for the preparation of serum from human blood samples and the measurement of NfL concentration using the NF-Light Advantage kit on the HD-X Analyzer (Quanterix, Billerica, MA).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

funders.funder_name: The Michael J. Fox Foundation for Parkinson’s Research (MJFF) and the Aligning Science Across Parkinson’s (ASAP) initiative.

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3efll","text":"At enrolment, collect 10 mL of venous blood from each participant in Serum Separator Tubes (SST): https://www.fishersci.co.uk/shop/products/vacutainer-sst-ii-advance-tubes/12927696","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":98,"length":82}],"data":{}},{"key":"c84u1","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"41u24","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"F6D31C07326111ECBBE20A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.fishersci.co.uk/shop/products/vacutainer-sst-ii-advance-tubes/12927696"}},"1":{"type":"safety","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3tctg","text":"Venepuncture and the handling of blood has the potential to expose research and","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"elign","text":"clinical personnel to blood borne pathogens. In order to minimise risk, personnel","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8bof8","text":"performing a venepuncture must have received appropriate training and deemed","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"24cqs","text":"competent. Institutional health \u0026 safety policies, risk assessments and standard","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9shca","text":"operating procedures must be followed.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ei7mj","text":"Within 1 hour of collection, centrifuge the SSTs at 2,500g for 15 minutes at room temperature","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8iumr","text":"Print cryogenic labels / barcodes and apply to cryotubes: https://www.brady.co.uk/labels","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":58,"length":30}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"354D4A55326211ECBBE20A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.brady.co.uk/labels"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5ut85","text":"Aliquot approx.    serum into labelled cryotubes, box and/or rack then store at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":17,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":80,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"icfc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"-0.5","error":false,"guid":"31B2BF90326011ECB8CD4560669983D3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"9D9E3DE0326211ECB8CD4560669983D3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2jbm8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5thk5","text":"Measure serum NfL concentration using the Simoa® NF-light Advantage Kit for HD-1 / HD-X following the manufacturers instructions : https://www.quanterix.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/NF-light-Data-Sheet-HD-1%E2%88%95HD-X-2.pdf ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":131,"length":96}],"data":{}},{"key":"3grie","text":"This kit is a digital immunoassay for the quantitative determination of NfL in serum, plasma and CSF.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1k6tv","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e21tf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"40B751B537DA11ECBADC0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.quanterix.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/NF-light-Data-Sheet-HD-1%E2%88%95HD-X-2.pdf"}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":87,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"16eb6","text":"*The measurement of serum NfL concentration is performed blinded to clinical diagnosis.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8r6a6","text":"Run on the HD-X Analyzer (Quanterix, Billerica, MA), a fully automated Simoa® bead-based immunoassay platform: https://www.quanterix.com/instruments/simoa-hd-x-analyzer/","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":111,"length":58}],"data":{}},{"key":"actro","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2fdvp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eggvp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7q16p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1233l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2har1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aj7rm","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"evnq1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"E16AFA29326111ECBBE20A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.quanterix.com/instruments/simoa-hd-x-analyzer"}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":14,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"d903d","text":"Key References","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":27,"offset":208}],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":6,"offset":35,"style":"italic"}],"key":"dls4k","text":"Gisslén M, Price RW, Andreasson U, et al. Plasma Concentration of the Neurofilament Light Protein (NFL) is a Biomarker of CNS Injury in HIV Infection: A Cross-Sectional Study. EBioMedicine 2016;3:135–40. doi:10.1016/j.ebiom.2015.11.036","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"guid":"8EED6B8E326611ECBBE20A58A9FEAC02","url":"doi:%2010.1016/j.ebiom.2015.11.036"},"mutability":"","type":"link"}}}}}}

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"3tq89","text":"Venepuncture, the handling and transport of blood has the potential to expose research and clinical personnel, and other professionals to blood borne pathogens. Those performing a venepuncture, handling or disposing clinical waste must be trained, competent and adhere to local health \u0026 safety policies, risk assessments and standard operating procedures.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
